title: Prohibits label obstruction of over-the-counter drugs
summary: Makes it illegal to knowingly alter, mutilate, destroy, obstruct, obscure or remove, by means of a sticker, tag or other device used to deter theft, or a price sticker, or otherwise, the whole or any part of the label including where applicable the expiration date displayed thereon, of any over-the-counter drug or cosmetic.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the sale of over-the-counter drugs
